review: I purchased my chromecast six months ago. The first four months were great, never skipped a beat and I was enjoying casting youtube and netflix on my HDTV.  Unfortunately, that is when things turned sour. All of a sudden I started having the dreaded "brain freeze" error.  The chromecast would reboot, and tell me to try again, only to brain freeze yet again within ten minutes.  Unless you are watching shows that cast for less than ten minutes, I suggest you look elsewhere. I'm hoping amazon takes this unit back after this much time, because I feel like I've been robbed!!  I'm actually surprised the reviews are still so high for this device, since I seem to see many who are having the same issue. Perhaps we all just got defective units.
